name: O O O
description:
Air hockey but you control both players.

Keep the puck from touching bad stuff to rack up points!

  • 5 Unique Maps
  • Show your rank!
  • Completely arcade based, no "win state"
  • Get on top to have your name shown to everyone who plays
Special thanks to Brass Harpooner for the backend service and personally helping with the leaderboard  Soundtracked by Dan1021
